text: This is a list of streams and rivers in Mozambique == B == Buzi River == C == Chindi River == K == Komati River == L == Limpopo River - Luambala River - Luangwa River - Lugenda River - Licungo River - Ligonha River - Lurio River == M == Maputo River - Mazowe River - Manisi River - Messalo River - Matola River == P == Pungwe River == R == Ruvuma River == S == Save River (Africa) - Shire River == Z == Zambezi River Mozambique Mozambique
title: List of rivers of Mozambique
